a.id AS "id", a.member_id AS "memberId", a.feedback_type AS "feedbackType", a.title AS "title", a.describeinfo AS "describeinfo", a.images AS "images", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.solution_time AS "solutionTime", a.modify_date AS "modifyDate", a.solution_state AS "solutionState", a.reply AS "reply", m.username AS "username", c.id AS "cId", c.file_name AS "fileName", c.file_path AS "filePath"
LEFT JOIN mem_member m ON a.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN user_complaint_attr_map b ON a.id = b.complaint_id LEFT JOIN tb_attachment c ON b.attachment_id = c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_complaint( id, member_id, feedback_type, title, describeinfo, images, del_flag, create_time, solution_time, modify_date, solution_state, reply ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{memberId}, #{feedbackType}, #{title}, #{describeinfo}, #{images}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{solutionTime}, #{modifyDate}, #{solutionState}, #{reply} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_complaint SET member_id = #{memberId}, feedback_type = #{feedbackType}, title = #{title}, describeinfo = #{describeinfo}, images = #{images}, create_time = #{createTime}, solution_time = #{solutionTime}, modify_date = #{modifyDate}, solution_state = #{solutionState}, reply = #{reply} WHERE id = #{id}
